title: Part 1
subtitle: Invocations

title: Part 2
subtitle: Bridging of the ocean by Nala and Nila; Sri Rama's installation of Sri Ramesvara

title: Part 3
subtitle: Sri Rama crosses the ocean with the whole army and encamps on Mount Suvela; Ravana feels agitated at the news

title: Part 4
subtitle: Mandodari expostulates with Ravana; dialogue between Ravana and Prahasta (his son)

title: Part 5
subtitle: A mental view of Sri Rama on Mount Suvela and a description of the rising moon

title: Part 6
subtitle: An arrow from Sri Rama's bow strikes down Ravana's diadems and umbrella

title: Part 7
subtitle: Mandodari makes remonstrance with Ravana again and dwells upon Sri Rama's glory

title: Part 8
subtitle: Angada's departure for Lanka and dialogue between Angada and Ravana in the latter's court

title: Part 9
subtitle: Mandodari offers advice to Ravana once more

title: Part 10
subtitle: Dialogue between Angada and Sri Rama; conflict actually begins

title: Part 11
subtitle: conflict actually begins

title: Part 12
subtitle: Malyavan's admonition to Ravana

title: Part 13
subtitle: The battle recommences; encounter between Laksmana and Meghanada; a javelin thrown by the latter strikes Laksmana in the breast

title: Part 14
subtitle: Hanuman fetches the physician Susena and proceeds in quest of the life-giving herb; dialogue between Kalanemi and Ravana, redemption of the she-alligator; deliverance of Kalanemi

title: Part 15
subtitle: Struck by Bharata's arrow, Hanuman drops down unconscious; dialogue between Bharata and Hanuman

title: Part 16
subtitle: Sri Rama's sport of a frantic wail; Hanuman's return; Laksmana's coming back to consciousness

title: Part 17
subtitle: Ravana awakes Kumbhakarna; Kumbhakarna's exhortation to Ravana and dialogue between Vibhisana and Kumbhakarna

title: Part 18
subtitle: Kumbhakarna joins the beale and attains final beatitude

title: Part 19
subtitle: Meghanada gives battle and Sri Rama sportfully allows Himself to be bound by a snare of serpents

title: Part 20
subtitle: Destruction of Meghanada's sacrificial performance; his engagement on the battle-field and deliverance at the hands of Laksmana

title: Part 21
subtitle: Råvana's march to the field of battle; Sri Rama's victory-chariot and an encounter between the monkeys and the demons

title: Part 22
subtitle: Encounter between Laksmana and Ravana

title: Part 23
subtitle: Ravana's swoon; destruction of his sacrificial performance; combat between Sri Rama and Ravana

title: Part 24
subtitle: Indra (the lord of paradise) sends a chariot for the use of Sri Rama; encounter between Sri Rama and Ravana

title: Part 25
subtitle: Ravana hurls a lance at Vibhisana : Sri Rama puts Vibhisana behind Him and exposes Himself to its full force; encounter between Vibhisana and Ravana

title: Part 26
subtitle: Combat of Ravana and Hanuman; Ravana creates phantoms and Sri Rama disperses the phantoms

title: Part 27
subtitle: Fierce fighting; Ravana's swoon

title: Part 28
subtitle: Dialogue between Sita and Trijata

title: Part 29
subtitle: Final encounter between Sri Rama and Ravana; end of Ravana; shouts of victory everywhere

title: Part 30
subtitle: Mandodari and other queens lament; Ravana's funeral

title: Part 31
subtitle: Vibhisana's installation

title: Part 32
subtitle: Hanumån carries the happy news to Sita; Sita rejoins Sti Rama and enters fire as a test of her purity

title: Part 33
subtitle: The gods sing the Lordís praises; Indra rains down nectar on the dead

title: Part 34
subtitle: Vibhisana's entreaty; Sri Rama portrayal and Bharataís condition by due to the excessive love he bore towards the Lord; Sri Rama urges Vibhisana to arrange His speedy return to Ayodhya

title: Part 35
subtitle: Vibhisana rains down clothes and ornaments from the air and the monkeys and bears pick them up and adorn their person with them

title: Part 36
subtitle: Sri Rama and Sita leave for Ayodhya on the aerial car, Puspaka
